Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Precise and concise. Can specify what i mean exactly in text better than in person.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: More straight to the point with AI, however much more personal and real with the teacher, and its good to see a human side to feedback.
